channel.title: JAVAC help, error when trying to run RSPS
channel.description:
hi guys,
i need someone help asap,
trying to run my own RSPS but when i try to run the source, i get a javac error
" javac is not recognised as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file "
if someone would be able to help me i would be so thankful, maybe via skype or something! skype: Dillonrslol
Thanks!

item.title: JAVAC help, error when trying to run RSPS
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

This should help you out:
http://oleanpkz.org/forum/index.php?topic=69.0

It is a tutorial on how to fix this problem.

Read full topic

item.title: JAVAC help, error when trying to run RSPS

item.description:
@matzie wrote:

What operating system are you running? and do you have JDK installed?
